dublin_core.dcvalue: Interactive health communication applications IHCAs that combine high quality health information with interactive components such as self assessment tools behavior change support peer support or decision support are likely to benefit people with long term conditions IHCAs are now largely Web based and are becoming known as Internet interventions Although there are numerous professionally generated criteria to assess health related websites to date there has been scant exploration of patient generated assessment criteria even though patients and professionals use different criteria for assessing the quality of traditional sources of health information
Made available in DSpace on 2020-02-10T17:28:40Z (GMT). No. of bitstreams: 0 Previous issue date: 2006-09-06
Internet interventions for long-term conditions: patient and caregiver quality criteria.
